import React, { useState } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; import { useNavigate,} from 'react-router-dom'; export default () => { const [name, setName] = useState(""); const [image, setImage] = useState(""); const [tesoro, setTesoro] = useState(""); const [frase, setFrase] = useState(""); const [position, setPosition] = useState(""); const [leg, setLeg] = useState(""); const [eye, setEye] = useState(""); const [hand, setHand] = useState(""); const [errors, setErrors] = useState({}); const navigate = useNavigate(); const onSubmitHandler = e => { e.preventDefault(); axios.post('http://localhost:8000/api/pirate', { name, image, tesoro, frase, position, leg, eye, hand, }) .then(res => { if(res.data.errors) { setErrors(res.data.errors); } else { navigate("/") } console.log(res) }) .catch(err => console.log(err)) } return (

Agregar Pirata

setName(e.target.value)} className="form-control" /> {errors.name ? errors.name.message: "" }
setImage(e.target.value)} className="form-control" /> {errors.image ? errors.image.message: "" }
setTesoro(e.target.value)} className="form-control" /> {errors.tesoro ? errors.tesoro.message: "" }
setFrase(e.target.value)} className="form-control" /> {errors.frase ? errors.frase.message: "" }


{errors.position ? errors.position.message: "" }
setLeg(!leg)} checked={leg} classname="form-check-input" type="checkbox" value="" id="flexCheckDefault" />
setEye(!eye)} checked={eye} classname="form-check-input" type="checkbox" value="" id="flexCheckDefault" />
setHand(!hand)} checked={hand} classname="form-check-input" type="checkbox" value="" id="flexCheckDefault" />
   
) }
